tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE financial_recommendations (
  user_id INT,
  spending_pattern TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE TransactionHistory (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  transaction_date DATE,
  amount DECIMAL,
  category VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
    age INT,
    location VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    amount DECIMAL,
    category VARCHAR(50),
    transaction_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE spending_patterns (
    pattern_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    high_spending_category VARCHAR(50),
    low_spending_category VARCHAR(50),
    average_spending DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE recommendations (
    recommendation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    best_recommendation TEXT,
    other_recommendations TEXT[]
)

CREATE TABLE logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    log_message TEXT,
    log_date TIMESTAMP
)
